Home.Description1: This application let you know the exchange rate by email.
Home.Description2: To everyone who feels bothered to check the exchange rate chart all the time for the timing of international money transfer or foreign exchange
Home.Description3: * The exchange rate emails are sent at 6am and 6pm JST (Japan Standard Time).

Modal.Text2: Please set base and converted currencies!
Modal.Text3: The inquiry email has been sent!
Modal.Text5: Are you sure to delete your account?
